name: CSR Death Moto Drift Racing Simulator – show mad skills to become a motocross bike race pro
name_original: CSR Death Moto Drift Racing Simulator – show mad skills to become a motocross bike race pro
description:
The world of speed is chaotic and fast, where only the true racing fans can survive the offroad and extreme trial challenges on the circuit, contending against the top dogs in the world of death moto racing.

Start on the motocross racing circuit as a rookie highway rider, climbing your way to the top by winning tournament races and defeating experienced moto riders in death moto combat. If you are up for some serious racing games and fighting games challenges, mount your bike and ignite the engines, its showtime!

FEATURES

Exhilarating and challenging moto circuit tournament races

Fierce death moto fights against challenging opponents, climb your way to the top

Play on various racing tracks, learning the different patterns and threats each poses

Realistic environment conditions engross you into the thrill of underground racing

Browse through numerous motocross bike models for racing, unlocking advanced bikes as you progress
